title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 7-3.6 - Application of installments based on preceding and second preceding year's tax
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 7-3.6 - Application of installments based on preceding and second preceding year's tax

State Regulations
(Tax Law, section 213-b(a) and (d))

Any amount of mandatory first installment paid must first
be applied as payment of the first installment against the estimated tax for
the current taxable year shown on the declaration required to be filed, and any
amount remaining must be considered as a payment on account of the tax shown on
the report required to be filed by the taxpayer for the current taxable year. If no declaration of estimated tax is required to be filed by the taxpayer, any
amount of mandatory first installment paid will be considered as a payment on
account of the tax shown on the report required to be filed by the taxpayer for
the current taxable year. Notes
